item.title: Report X-2024061921
item.description:
Report X-2024061921

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-02T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-18
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A DESIGNATED RESPONDER TOOK THE CALL. THEY DONNED THEIR P.P.E. UPON VISUAL INSPECTIONS/ DISCOVERED THAT THE LEAKING PACKAGE WAS A DECLARED CORROSIVE 8 HAZMAT IN A 5-GALLON BUCKET WITH NO ADDITIONAL PACKAGING. RESPONDER USE THE DECISION-TREE AND BASED ON THE LABEL USED THE CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONSDER CONTAINERIZED THE PACKAGE INTO A LINED SPILL TUB AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. DONNED PPE AND MOVED THE LEAKER TO WORKAREA. REVIEWED PRODUCT AND SDS WITH RMP.

item.description:

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE LEAKING CLASS 8 HAZMAT WAS RESPONDED TO BY RESPONDER, THE PACKAGE WAS RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. ALL MERCHANDISE WAS AFFECTED BY THE SPILL. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024061445
item.description:
Report X-2024061445

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-14
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE FOUND IN THE EAST UNLOAD WHERE CALL WAS MADE TO PSC FOR CLEAN UP. RESPONDER WENT TO DOOR 35 FOLLOWED SMALL PACKAGE DECISION TREE AND DONNED PPE. RESPONDER CLEANED UP SPILL AND BROUGHT PACKAGE AND DEBRIS BACK TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. RESPONDER DISCOVERED UNDECLARED OXIDIZING LIQUID N.O.S AND CORROSIVE LIQUIDS N.O.S.
